azurerm_backup_protected_vm.description: Manages an Azure Backup Protected VM.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Recovery Services Protected VM. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

recovery_vault_name.description: Specifies the name of the Recovery Services Vault to use. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

source_vm_id.description: Specifies the ID of the VM to backup. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

backup_policy_id.description: Specifies the id of the backup policy to use.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Backup Protected Virtual Machine.

create.description: Used when creating the Backup Protected Virtual Machine.

update.description: Used when updating the Backup Protected Virtual Machine.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Backup Protected Virtual Machine.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Backup Protected Virtual Machine.
